Hi,
	This doesn't help you, but it seems to me you have a nice test-case for 
modularity here?

	e.g. the outputs for the segments could clearly be evolved using 7 
separate networks.  Which are presumably easier to evolve?  So a test for a 
modularity system should be it's ability to spot that and subdivide the 
problem itself.

	I say nothing about how many generations might be involved.

	Ian Badcoe
